Name: Javier
description:
Javier, a hard-working man, has been a farmer since he was very young. He grows onions, tomatoes, potatoes and carrots. As a farmer, he has a calm and friendly character, which allows him to be loved by the community where he lives and where he sells his products.

He has many dreams and projects that he wants to realize. He wants to make improvements in his production. As a client of Sembrar Sartawi IFD, he aims to obtain a loan that will allow him to improve the irrigation system that currently comes from a well. With this institution he was able to obtain the expected advice and financing to achieve this objective.
